update_internal_state.description: When this integration starts, it caches the state for all lights. Each scene is activated which results in flickering. If any scene changes, you must call this. Maybe do it once per day.

offset.name: Offset to the brightness. 0.3 => 30% brighter all the time

factor.name: Multiplicative factor to the brightness. Applied before the offset.
